body:
Package `bolt` is not building on `Ubuntu 18.04` for `ppc64le`. Likewise, not building for `CentOS 7` and `RHEL 7` for `ppc64le`. Using Spack @ develop (commit 958f26073efe340d5 from 18-March-2020). It is a `power8` host.

```
$> spack install bolt%gcc@7.3.0 target=ppc64le
# fails with a verbose error, see full build log below
# looks like scoping errors involving KMP_ macros, but I don't know
```

Full build log:  [bolt-ppc64le-build-log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4350618/bolt-ppc64le-build-log.txt)



@shintaro-iwasaki @raffenet
title: bolt build fails on ppc64le
